column4: hi guys ... my card is not getting an ip from dhcp .. how do i set static ip?
it worked fine till i plugged out the cable
and, would you like this set up with a terminal, or a GUI?
set up something like http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/2446 in your /etc/network/interfaces file, to get a static IP.
there is no rebooting in linux, pretty much. you turn off then on the interface. sudo ifdown eth0 ; sudo ifup eth0
congratulations on answering your own question within seconds.
